title: Exileplanet.xyz
brief: A blog platform for seamless content creation and management
bulletPoints: Built with Node.js and Express for a robust backend
Utilizes MySQL with JSON for flexible post storage
Images stored as BLOBs for efficient handling
Advanced tag indexing for quick searches

title: Fruitconnect.xyz
brief: A fruit-matching game. Connect fruits to score points in 10 turns and compete on the scoreboard!
bulletPoints: Built with Bun.js and Express for a robust backend
Utilizes in-memory sqlite to save game progress.
MongoDB used to save completed games and display a scoreboard.
Depth first search algorithm to calculate connected fruits.
